text: Hello and welcome everyone. This is Minoo at Anglo-Link.
In this lesson, we're going to look at some common words, such as
that I often hear mispronounced by my students regardless of their native language.
This is because English spelling is highly irregular.
You cannot rely on the spelling of a word to tell you how it's pronounced.
So, let's make sure you're not mispronouncing these 40 common words.
Well, that's the end of this pronunciation lesson. I hope you've enjoyed it.
If you would like more pronunciation practice to improve your spoken fluency,
you are very welcome to join my complete online course at
All the lessons in my course, whether they teach you grammar, vocabulary, or pronunciation,
are voice recorded so you can hear and learn the correct pronunciation of all the words you learn.
Thank you for joining me in this lesson and see you again very soon.
